revised_title: First Solution of a Molecular Transcorrelated Wave Equation for LiH
tldr: The authors present the first solution of a molecular transcorrelated wave equation for the molecule LiH using a restricted numerical integration procedure. This method allows for higher accuracy in energy calculations and has the potential to be applied to a wide range of molecules and reacting systems. The transcorrelated method introduces factors dependent directly on the interelectronic distance, which can improve the accuracy of molecular energy predictions.
